Text:
@WarWraith Yep. We should have had clinics, procedures etc. put in place weeks ago when the dipshit bignoted we were ahead of the curve and he was calling it a pandemic.

But since then just bullshit spin, which of course media flogs every single time ARGH!

This is not good enough.

Seriously, another day another lead news item on the ABC giving Australians the impression that the government is addressing this pandemic.

NOTHING CONCRETE that will operationally assist Australians has happened at all. Nothing!

Each plan of course leaked to media to sound good, sounds like Government is doing something about this pandemic. In reality have done sweet frack all, except of course get a shitload of media to promote the spin they are "going to..." do something.

No wonder there is panic.

Federal Gov must have a daily morning briefing. States & Territories then follow. Saturation messaging everyday on status of pandemic, actions for people to follow. Twice daily briefs to every general practice ... where is this?? @Bowenchris @GregHuntMP @David_Speers @SabraLane

@Jason CN were way too slow to recognize & contain. No doubt will become global pandemic. Organisation, infra, healthcare good enough to stop in US but econ impact of millions sick globally would be huge. Worst case it doesnt just kill the old/weak but also healthy ppl. Then BIG prob!
